meanings.definition: To become or make wrinkled or contracted
meanings.sent1: Leaves shrivel in the hot sun.
meanings.sent2: The grapes shrivel up when not watered.
meanings.sent3: The balloon shrivels and squeaks as the air escapes.
meanings.sent4: Her hopes shrivel like a flower without water.
meanings.sent5: The old apple shrivels into a tiny, wrinkled ball.

meanings.sent1: His enthusiasm shrivels after the long meeting.
meanings.sent2: The fire shrivels down to embers.
meanings.sent3: The party shrivels as guests leave early.
meanings.sent4: The music shrivels into a faint echo in the distance.
meanings.sent5: Her smile shrivels as bad news sinks in.
